00001 #ifndef SCALARITERATOR2_H_
00002 #define SCALARITERATOR2_H_
00003 
00004 #include "Idx.h"
00005 #include <algorithm>
00006 
00007 namespace ebl {
00008 
00009 template<typename T>
00010 class ScalarIterator {
00011 
00012 public:
00013   ScalarIterator(Idx<T>& idx, bool* not_done)
00014     :ptr_(idx.idx_ptr()),
00015      spec_(idx.spec),
00016      not_done_(not_done) {
00017 
00018     *not_done_ = true;
00019     
00020     // if idx is 0-dimensional, pretend it's a size-1 vector.
00021     if ( spec_.ndim == 0 ) {
00022       spec_.unfold_inplace(0,1,1);
00023     }
00024     
00025     std::fill(inds_, inds_+spec_.ndim, 0);
00026     
00027     row_end_ = ptr_ + spec_.mod[spec_.ndim-1] * spec_.dim[spec_.ndim-1];
00028     iter_end_ = ptr_ + (spec_.mod[0] * spec_.dim[0]);
00029 
00030     // TODO: for contiguous dimensions, the step_sizes_ will be zero.
00031     // reshape spec to collapse such dimensions.
00032     for ( int dim_ind = 0; dim_ind < spec_.ndim-1; ++dim_ind ) {
00033       step_sizes_[dim_ind_] = spec_.mod[dim_ind_] - 
00034                               spec_.mod[dim_ind_+1]*spec_.dim[dim_ind_+1];
00035     }
00036     step_sizes_[spec_.ndim - 1] = spec_.mod[spec_.ndim - 1];
00037     dim_ind_ = spec_.ndim - 1;
00038     
00039     row_step_size_ = spec_.mod[spec_.ndim - 1];
00040     
00041     // for debugging 
00042    // row_end_ = idx.idx_ptr() + idx.dim(idx.order()-1);
00043   }
00044 
00045   inline void operator++() {
00046     //++ptr_;
00047     ptr_ += row_step_size_;
00048 //    ptr_ += step_sizes_[dim_ind_];
00049     if ( ptr_ == row_end_ ) {
00050       if ( ptr_ == iter_end_ ) {
00051         *not_done_ = false;
00052       }
00053       else if ( spec_.ndim > 1 ) {
00054         --dim_ind_;
00055         ++inds_[dim_ind_];
00056         ptr_ += step_sizes_[dim_ind_];
00057         while ( inds_[dim_ind_] == spec_.dim[dim_ind_] && dim_ind_ > 0 ) {
00058           inds_[dim_ind_] = 0;
00059           --dim_ind_;
00060           ++inds_[dim_ind_];
00061           ptr_ += step_sizes_[dim_ind_];
00062         }
00063         dim_ind_ = spec_.ndim - 1;
00064         row_end_ = ptr_ + step_sizes_[dim_ind_] * spec_.dim[dim_ind_];
00065       }
00066     }
00067   }
00068 
00069   ScalarIterator<T>& operator=(const ScalarIterator<T>& other) {
00070     using std::copy;
00071     dim_ind_ = other.dim_ind_;
00072     ptr_ = other.ptr_;
00073     row_end_ = other.row_end_;
00074     iter_end_ = other.iter_end_;
00075     copy(other.inds_, other.inds_+other.spec_.ndim-1, inds_);
00076     copy(other.step_sizes_, other.step_sizes_ + other.spec_.ndim, step_sizes_);
00077     spec_ = other.spec_;
00078     return *this;
00079   }
00080   
00081   inline bool NotDone() const {
00082     return ptr_ != iter_end_;
00083   }
00084   
00085   inline double& operator*(){
00086     return *ptr_;
00087   }
00088 
00089 private:
00090   // TODO(mkg): convert ints to intgs where appropriate.
00091   
00092   // local variable to operator++, allocated here for efficiency.
00093   int dim_ind_;
00094   
00095   // the current element
00096   T* ptr_;
00097   
00098   // marks the end of the current "row" 
00099   T* row_end_;
00100   
00101   // marks the end of the entire iteration
00102   T* iter_end_;
00103   
00104   // The first ndim-1 IDX indices of the the current element.
00105   double inds_[MAXDIMS-1];
00106   
00107   // step_sizes[i] is the amount to shift ptr_ by when 
00108   // looping dimension i (i.e. when incrementing dimension i-1).
00109   // We define step_sizes[ndim-1] to be mod[dim-1].
00110   int step_sizes_[MAXDIMS];
00111   
00112   // The amount to shift the iterator by 
00113   int row_step_size_;
00114   
00115   // This is not necessarily identical to the idx's spec.
00116   IdxSpec spec_;
00117   
00118   bool* not_done_;
00119 };
00120
